name: Flame Keepers
description:
You play as a two-person expedition crew in a dungeon that's filled with chests and coins.  Unfortunately, you only brought a single torch... It's your task to delve as deep as possible, but beware! For there are hostile creatures lurking in the dark. You can beat them, but only by throwing a torch between the two of you. 

How deep can you travel in the dungeon? How much money can you obtain before you die? How many enemies can you kill?

Details

This game was made for the 168th weekly game jam: "Pass the Torch".

While there are two playable characters, the goal of the game is to play it single-player and be aware of both players at the same time. Of course, local multiplayer is also an option!

Controls Movement Player 1Either WASD, ZQSD, IJKL or the arrow keys.Movement Player 2Either WASD, ZQSD, IJKL or the arrow keys.Passing the TorchSpace

The player controls can be swapped around in-game in a limited manner.
